title: RAK7271/RAK7371 WisGate Developer Base Guide > RAK7271/RAK7371 Quick Start Guide > Prerequisites > Hardware > Prerequisites for RAK7271/7371 WisGate Developer Base Installation
content:
Before proceeding with the installation guide for the RAK7271/7371 WisGate Developer Base, ensure you have prepared the necessary items listed below.:  
1. [WisGate Developer Base RAK7271 or RAK7371](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/wisgate-developer-base?utm_source=wisgatedeveloperbase&utm_medium=Document&utm_campaign=BuyFromStore)
2. A Host - Linux running PC/laptop or Raspberry Pi
parent_content:
Before proceeding with the installation guide for the RAK7271/7371 WisGate Developer Base, ensure you have prepared the necessary items listed below.:  
1. [WisGate Developer Base RAK7271 or RAK7371](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/wisgate-developer-base?utm_source=wisgatedeveloperbase&utm_medium=Document&utm_campaign=BuyFromStore)
2. A Host - Linux running PC/laptop or Raspberry Pi  
> **WARNING:** The SIM card slot of the cellular versions is not hot-swappable. Make sure the gateway is switched off before inserting or ejecting the SIM card.

title: RAK7271/RAK7371 WisGate Developer Base Guide > RAK7271/RAK7371 Quick Start Guide > Prerequisites > Package Inclusion > Package Contents [TABLE]
content:
1. 1pc WisGate Developer Base
2. 1pc USB Type C to A Cable
3. 1pc LoRa Antenna  
> **Image:** Package Content
parent_content:
1. 1pc WisGate Developer Base
2. 1pc USB Type C to A Cable
3. 1pc LoRa Antenna  
> **Image:** Package Content

title: RAK7271/RAK7371 WisGate Developer Base Guide > RAK7271/RAK7371 Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Linux Machine as a Host > Interface Between the Linux Machine and the WisGate Developer Base > Connect WisGate Developer Base to Host PC
content:
Connect the two devices using the included USB cable to the host PC. It is recommended to use **Ubuntu 18.04 LTS** as the operating system.  
> **Image:** Connect the WisGate Developer Base to the Host
parent_content:
Connect the two devices using the included USB cable to the host PC. It is recommended to use **Ubuntu 18.04 LTS** as the operating system.  
> **Image:** Connect the WisGate Developer Base to the Host

title: RAK7271/RAK7371 WisGate Developer Base Guide > RAK7271/RAK7371 Quick Start Guide > Product Configuration > Linux Machine as a Host > Software Installation > Install and Configure Software for WisGate Developer Base
content: To use the Base, you need to install and configure the required software. The procedure varies slightly between the two variants of the WisGate Developer Base.
parent_content: To use the Base, you need to install and configure the required software. The procedure varies slightly between the two variants of the WisGate Developer Base.
